remarks: The evaluation of a scalar of a subring yields the same result as evaluated as a scalar over the ring itself.  (Contributed by AV, 12-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evlsscasrng.q $e |- Q = ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) $.
evlsscasrng.o $e |- O = ( I eval S ) $.
evlsscasrng.w $e |- W = ( I mPoly U ) $.
evlsscasrng.u $e |- U = ( S |`s R ) $.
evlsscasrng.p $e |- P = ( I mPoly S ) $.
evlsscasrng.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evlsscasrng.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
evlsscasrng.c $e |- C = ( algSc ` P ) $.
evlsscasrng.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
evlsscasrng.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evlsscasrng.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
evlsscasrng.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. R ) $.
evlsscasrng $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( A ` X ) ) = ( O ` ( C ` X ) ) ) $.
